resources.comments: Conditional Azure Policy Assignment for Azure Activity Logs to Log Analytics
resources.name: [variables('policyAssignmentNames').deployActivityLog]

resources.comments: Role assignment for Azure Policy assignment for Azure Activity Logs to Log Analytics
resources.name: [variables('roleAssignmentNames').deployActivityLog]

resources.comments: Conditional Azure Policy Assignment for Azure Activity Logs to Azure Storage for LTR
resources.name: [variables('policyAssignmentNames').deployActivityLogSta]

resources.comments: Role assignment for Azure Policy assignment for Azure Activity Logs to Azure Storage for LTR
resources.name: [variables('roleAssignmentNames').deployActivityLogSta]

resources.comments: Conditional assignment of Azure Policy to enforce Log Analytics VM extension to Windows and Linux virtual machines
resources.name: [variables('policyAssignmentNames').deployVmMonitoring]

resources.comments: Role assignment for the conditional VM monitoring policy assignment
resources.name: [variables('roleAssignmentNames').deployVmMonitoring]

resources.comments: Conditional Azure Policy Assignment for Azure Resource Diagnostics Logs to Log Analytics
resources.name: [variables('policyAssignmentNames').deployResourceDiagnostics]

resources.comments: Role assignment for Azure Policy for Azure Resource Diagnostic Logs to Log Analytics
resources.name: [variables('roleAssignmentNames').deployResourceDiagnostics]

resources.comments: Conditional Azure Policy Assignment to enforce ASC Configuration on subscriptions
resources.name: [variables('policyAssignmentNames').deployAzureSecurity]

resources.comments: Role assignment for Azure Policy assignment of ASC Configuration
resources.name: [variables('roleAssignmentNames').deployAzureSecurity]

resources.comments: Conditional Azure Policy Assignment to enforce ASC Auto Provisioning on subscriptions
resources.name: [variables('policyAssignmentNames').deployAzureSecurityAutoProvision]

resources.comments: Role assignment for Azure Policy assignment of ASC Auto Provisioning
resources.name: [variables('roleAssignmentNames').deployAzureSecurityAutoProvision]

resources.comments: Conditional Azure Policy Assignment to enable ASC monitoring on subscriptions
resources.name: [variables('policyAssignmentNames').enableAscMonitoring]

resources.comments: Azure Policy Assignment to Deny Azure App Gateway without WAF
resources.name: [variables('policyAssignmentNames').denyAppGwyWaf]

resources.comments: Azure Policy Assignment to Deploy NSG Flow Logs
resources.name: [variables('policyAssignmentNames').deployNsgFlowLogs]

resources.comments: Role assignment for Azure Policy assignment to deploy NSG Flow Logs
resources.name: [variables('roleAssignmentNames').deployNsgFlowLogs]

resources.comments: Conditional deployment for Azure Activity Logs to Log Analytics on Platform Management subscription
resources.name: [if(not(empty(parameters('managementSubscriptionId'))), variables('managementDeploymentNames').mgmtActivityLogs, variables('managementDeploymentNames').noMgmtActivityDeployment)]

resources.comments: Conditional deployment for Azure Activity Logs to Log Analytics on Platform Identity subscription
resources.name: [if(not(empty(parameters('identitySubscriptionId'))), variables('identityDeploymentNames').idamActivityLogs, variables('identityDeploymentNames').noIdamActivityDeployment)]

resources.comments: Conditional deployment for Azure Activity Logs to Log Analytics on Platform Connectivity subscription
resources.name: [if(not(empty(parameters('connectivitySubscriptionId'))), variables('connectivityDeploymentNames').connActivityLogs, variables('connectivityDeploymentNames').noConnActivityDeployment)]

resources.comments: Conditional deployment for ASC Configuration on Platform Management subscription
resources.name: [if(not(empty(parameters('managementSubscriptionId'))), variables('managementDeploymentNames').mgmtAscConfig, variables('managementDeploymentNames').noMgmtAscDeployment)]

resources.comments: Conditional deployment for ASC Configuration on Platform Identity subscription
resources.name: [if(not(empty(parameters('identitySubscriptionId'))), variables('identityDeploymentNames').idamAscConfig, variables('identityDeploymentNames').noIdamAscDeployment)]

resources.comments: Conditional deployment for ASC Configuration on Platform Connectivity subscription
resources.name: [if(not(empty(parameters('connectivitySubscriptionId'))), variables('connectivityDeploymentNames').connAscConfig, variables('connectivityDeploymentNames').noConnAscDeployment)]

resources.comments: Conditional deployment for ASC Auto Provisioning on Platform Management subscription
resources.name: [if(not(empty(parameters('managementSubscriptionId'))), variables('managementDeploymentNames').mgmtAscAutoProvision, variables('managementDeploymentNames').noMgmtAscAutoProvisionDeployment)]

resources.comments: Conditional deployment for ASC Auto Provisioning on Platform Identity subscription
resources.name: [if(not(empty(parameters('identitySubscriptionId'))), variables('identityDeploymentNames').idamAscAutoProvision, variables('identityDeploymentNames').noIdamAscAutoProvisionDeployment)]

resources.comments: Conditional deployment for ASC Auto Provisioning on Platform Connectivity subscription
resources.name: [if(not(empty(parameters('connectivitySubscriptionId'))), variables('connectivityDeploymentNames').connAscAutoProvision, variables('connectivityDeploymentNames').noConnAscAutoProvisionDeployment)]
